dcterms:description: The standard dataset commonly used for human pose estimation. It contains approximately 250,000 annotated poses from various everyday activities. However, the COCO dataset includes very few images captured from extreme views.
dcterms:title: COCO

dcterms:creator: Linzhi Huang
Yulong Li
Hongbo Tian
Yue Yang
Xiangang Li
Weihong Deng
Jieping Ye
dcterms:description: WEPDTOF-Pose dataset published recently. It contains manual pose annotation for selected individuals from the WEPDTOF dataset used for person detection. The dataset comes in separate images, which suppresses various errors.
dcterms:title: WEPDTOF-Pose

dcterms:creator: Jingrui Yu
Tobias Scheck
Roman Seidel
Yukti Adya
Dipankar Nandi
Gangolf Hirtz
dcterms:description: PoseFES is a manually annotated dataset captured by a ceiling-mounted fisheye camera, serving as the solely available top-view dataset for human pose estimation. It consists of two sequences: one focusing on two well-separated individuals, while the second involves multiple people interacting.
dcterms:title: PoseFES

dcterms:description: A new dataset created to evaluate pose estimation in dynamic environments, consisting of images extracted from various sports videos obtained from YouTube, focusing on bottom views.
dcterms:title: RePo Bottom

dcterms:description: A new dataset created to evaluate pose estimation in dynamic environments, consisting of images extracted from various sports videos obtained from YouTube, focusing on top views.
dcterms:title: RePo Top

dcterms:creator: Naureen Mahmood
Nima Ghorbani
Nikolaus F. Troje
Gerard Pons-Moll
Michael J. Black
dcterms:description: AMASS is an archive of motion capture data that provides a large database of 3D poses from 3D scans, allowing for the generation of realistic human poses.
dcterms:title: AMASS

dcterms:creator: Jingrui Yu
Tobias Scheck
Roman Seidel
Yukti Adya
Dipankar Nandi
Gangolf Hirtz
dcterms:description: THEODORE+ provides a synthetic collection of top-view videos generated using a game engine, showing individuals walking in a room.
dcterms:title: THEODORE+
